__Conference Hotels:__

We are excited to offer three great options for lodging for participants in this year’s symposium at the Illini Union Hotel, Hampton Inn, and Hawthorn Suites.

Group Block name for all three: HLS.

The deadline to make reservations at the Illini Union Hotel and the Hampton Inn as a part of the group block is August 23, 2015. The deadline for the Hawthorn Suites is August 24, 2015. Reservations made after this date will be made only on a space available basis.

The conference block discount is only available for the days of the conference (September 24th-27th).

To make your housing reservation, please contact the hotel directly.

__Other accomodation options:__

Hampton Inn

Address: 1200 W University Ave, Urbana, IL 61801

Phone: (217) 337-1100

Website: http://hamptoninn3.hilton.com/en/hotels/illinois/hampton-inn-champaign-urbana-CMIILHX/index.html

Room Reservation Information: 25 rooms blocked off. 10 Queens at \$149. 15 Kings at \$149 + 12% TAX.

For your convenience, the hotel is located about a 10-minute walk from campus. Also, a free campus bus service is available for transportation between the Hapmton Inn and the Illini Union via the “22 Illini” route – between the “N” University & Goodwin (SW Far Side) stop and the “E” Illini Union (Engineering Side) stop, which runs every ten minutes. More information regarding the bus schedule and route can be found at here.
